snippet: As the gothic romance vampire series “Twilight” ends with the release of the final film, fans on Thursday night in New York were not as fervent as those in other parts of the country.
abstract: Fans in New York City preparing for release of Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn Part 2, final film of blockbuster teenage vampire series, appear to be not as fervent as those in other parts of the country.
lead_paragraph: As the gothic romance vampire series “Twilight” ends with the release of the final film, fans on Thursday night in New York were not as fervent as those in other parts of the country.

headline.seo: ‘Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn — Part 2’: Fans Bid Farewell
headline.main: A Farewell to Fangs, Fur and Fandom
headline.print_headline: A Farewell To Fangs, Fur And Fandom
